content.p: Having someone to go to for your career plans will drastically improve your ability to succeed at it. It is our goal to do our best in providing you with a wide range of job finding resources in order for you to understand the workforce landscape and help you form a strategy to land your dream job. As a student, you can log into our MyCareer for Student to book a CV review or career advice appointment, sign-up for careers events and workshops, explore job and internship opportunities, and access leaflets and careers resources. Assistance with job search strategies and action plan Gain industry exposure through alumni and employer mentoring A one-stop centre housing print resources and careers publication What you can do now to launch your international career Printable information relevant to your job-search efforts Online tools to help you with career planning and job search methods Plan your postgraduate career development to manage your career Various ranges of events to support your career preparation Get a free taste of industry experience from virtual programs telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
